comment.author: 94563365@N00
comment._content: A three legged mule, Tripod ,the talking mule.

comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: You’re right! Thanks for drawing our attention to this, House of ill repute photography. We have changed the record here to indicate that this is in fact a mule, and the change has been made in the catalog record in the Florida Photographic Collection, www.floridamemory.com/PhotographicCollection/. Thanks again. Florida Memory
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida
